idea-plugin.name: Git Assume Unchanged
idea-plugin.description:
Manage Git's assume-unchanged flag directly from the IDE.

This plugin adds convenient actions to mark files as "assume-unchanged" or remove that flag, allowing you to tell Git to temporarily ignore changes to tracked files.

Features:

  • Mark single or multiple files as assume-unchanged
  • Remove assume-unchanged flag from files
  • Accessible via Git context menu
  • Automatic Git repository validation
  • Clear success/error notifications

Usage:

Right-click on any file(s) in the project view → Git → Git Assume → Choose action

action.description: Mark file(s) as assume-unchanged (Git will ignore changes)
Remove assume-unchanged flag (Git will track changes again)
